name: MedionSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, turn off living room plug”
”Alexa, set light to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The skill allows you to interact with your MEDION Smart Home devices by voice. 
Enable the skill and link with your MEDION Smart Home account. You will be able to control your MEDION Smart Home devices. 

This skill can directly control your MEDION Smart Home devices via our product such as power plug or LED bulb.

The full skill list is also available at: www.medion.com/smarthome

skills:
(Terms in > < are variable and dependent on your system)
Search for devices:
-Alexa, discover my smart home devices

Examples for the LED bulb:
 - Alexa, turn on the >lamp<
 - Alexa, turn off the >lamp<
 - Alexa, set the >lamp< to >20< percent

Examples for the power plug:
 - Alexa, turn on the >fan<
 - Alexa, turn off the >fan<

Examples for thermostat:
 - Alexa, set the >bathroom< to >20< degrees
 - Alexa, what is the temperature of the >bathroom<?

Example for smoke detector (built-in buzzer):
- Alexa, turn on the >smoke detector<
